metadata.title: CVE-2023-4949 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An attacker with local access to a system (either through a disk orexternal drive) can present a modified XFS partition to grub-legacy in sucha way to exploit a memory corruption in grubâ€™s XFS file systemimplementation.

criterions.comment: grub: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
